verses.verse: O <S%H5414>that<s%> you were as my <S%H251>brother<s%>, that <S%H3243>sucked<s%> the <S%H7699>breasts<s%> of my <S%H517>mother<s%>! when I should <S%H4672>find<s%> you <S%H2351>outside<s%>, I would <S%H5401>kiss<s%> <S%H936>you<s%>; Yes, I should not be despised.

I would <S%H5090>lead<s%> <S%H935>you<s%>, and bring you into my <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, who would <S%H3925>instruct<s%> <S%H8248>me<s%>: I would cause you to drink of <S%H7544>spiced<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> of the <S%H6071>juice<s%> of my <S%H7416>pomegranate<s%>.
His left <S%H8040>hand<s%> should be under my <S%H7218>head<s%>, and his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> should embrace <S%H2263>me<s%>.
I <S%H7650>charge<s%> <S%H1323>you<s%>, O daughters of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, that you stir not <S%H5782>up<s%>, nor <S%H5782>awake<s%> my <S%H160>love<s%>, until he <S%H2654>please<s%>.

Who is this that comes <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, <S%H7514>leaning<s%> upon her <S%H1730>beloved<s%>? I <S%H5782>raised<s%> you up under the apple <S%H8598>tree<s%>: there your <S%H517>mother<s%> brought you <S%H2254>forth<s%>: there she brought you <S%H2254>forth<s%> that bore <S%H3205>you<s%>.

<S%H7760>Set<s%> me as a <S%H2368>seal<s%> upon your <S%H3820>heart<s%>, as a <S%H2368>seal<s%> upon your <S%H2220>arm<s%>: for <S%H160>love<s%> is <S%H5794>strong<s%> as <S%H4194>death<s%>; <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> is <S%H7186>cruel<s%> as the <S%H7585>grave<s%>: the <S%H7565>coals<s%> there are <S%H7565>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%>, which has a most vehement <S%H7957>flame<s%>.

<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3518>quench<s%> <S%H160>love<s%>, neither can the <S%H5104>floods<s%> <S%H7857>drown<s%> <S%H376>it<s%>: if a man would <S%H5414>give<s%> all the <S%H1952>substance<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%> for <S%H160>love<s%>, it would <S%H936>utterly<s%> be <S%H936>despised<s%>.

We have a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%>, and she has no <S%H7699>breasts<s%>: what shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> for our <S%H269>sister<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when she shall be spoken <S%H1696>for<s%>?

If she be a <S%H2346>wall<s%>, we will <S%H1129>build<s%> upon her a <S%H2918>palace<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>: and if she be a <S%H1817>door<s%>, we will <S%H6696>enclose<s%> her with <S%H3871>boards<s%> of <S%H730>cedar<s%>.
I am a <S%H2346>wall<s%>, and my <S%H7699>breasts<s%> like <S%H4026>towers<s%>: then was I in his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> as one that <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7965>favor<s%>.

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had a <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> at <S%H1174>Baal<s%>â€“hamon; he let <S%H5414>out<s%> the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> unto <S%H5201>keepers<s%>; every <S%H376>one<s%> for the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> there was to <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.

My <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, which is <S%H6440>mine<s%>, is before <S%H8010>me<s%>: you, O Solomon, must have a <S%H505>thousand<s%>, and those that <S%H5201>keep<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> there two <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.
You that <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H1588>gardens<s%>, the <S%H2270>companions<s%> <S%H7181>listen<s%> to your <S%H6963>voice<s%>: cause me to hear <S%H8085>it<s%>.

Make <S%H1272>haste<s%>, my <S%H1730>beloved<s%>, and be you <S%H1819>like<s%> to a <S%H6643>roe<s%> or to a <S%H6082>young<s%> <S%H354>hart<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H1314>spices<s%>.
